segments.text: Professor Li , do you know where to buy art supplies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For what ? Are you taking up painting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I can't paint . I'm asking for my niece . She is really into it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , good . How old is your niece ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is eight . Actually , I'm buying a good set of art supplies for her as a birthday gift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a wise thing to do . Art will do a child a world of good .
segments.speaker: S2
